user.title: Menstrual Cycle Tracker
user.description: Give your tracker a name. You can add multiple trackers for different people.

cycle1.title: Most Recent Cycle
cycle1.description: Enter your most recent period dates (optional). Leave blank to skip.

cycle2.title: Second Most Recent Cycle
cycle2.description: Enter your second most recent period dates (optional). Leave blank to skip.

cycle3.title: Third Most Recent Cycle
cycle3.description: Enter your third most recent period dates (optional). Leave blank to skip.
